solution_line_template: Since, three years from now, Tabitha will have {colors_in_future} different colors in her hair, this year she has {colors_in_future} - {years_from_now} = <<{colors_in_future}-{years_from_now}={current_colors}>>{current_colors} colors in her hair.

Since she had {colors_at_15} colors in her hair at the age of {age_at_2_colors}, she has added {current_colors}-{colors_at_15}={colors_added_since_15} colors since she was {age_at_2_colors} years old.
Since she ads one color per year, {colors_added_since_15} added colors = <<{colors_added_since_15}={years_added}>>{years_added} added years
Thus, currently, she is {age_at_2_colors}+{years_added}=<<{age_at_2_colors}+{years_added}={current_age}>>{current_age} years old.
